definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: Jack fought John in the men 's singles last night and as beaten.
sentences.chinese: 傑克昨晚在男子單打比賽中與約翰相遇，結果輸了。

sentences.english: Singles should ideally look for sites where they will find people who are similarly abled .
sentences.chinese: 單打最好看的網站，他們將在那裏找到人，誰也同樣。

sentences.english: It is Sunday afternoon, and Jim and Leon have just played a match of singles tennis.
sentences.chinese: 週日下午，吉姆和利昂剛打了一場網球單打賽。

sentences.english: Dallas managed to run some effective isolations for Jerry Stackhouse.
sentences.chinese: 達拉斯成功地組織了一些斯塔克豪斯的單打。

sentences.english: The win in the last singles match gave them a final win of 3-1.
sentences.chinese: 在最後的勝利給了他們一場單打比賽決賽中以3比1。

sentences.english: This week, though, you really don't need to struggle on single-handedly.
sentences.chinese: 但是，本週你實在無需單打獨幹。

sentences.english: Numerous counterexamples show the perils of solitary innovation.
sentences.chinese: 有很多例子表明單打獨鬥的創新的危害性。

sentences.english: Kyrie's greatest skill is his isolation scoring.
sentences.chinese: 歐文的最厲害的技能包就是單打得分。

sentences.english: Modern badminton is a game for two or four players using lightweight rackets and a shuttlecock.
sentences.chinese: 現代羽毛球運動分爲單打和雙打，羽毛球拍重量較輕。

sentences.english: Back Alley- Area between the back boundary line and the long service line for doubles.
sentences.chinese: 單打端線和雙打端線之間的長地帶。

sentences.english: Juggling four-club singles can be more difficult than four-club doubles.
sentences.chinese: 戲法四俱樂部單打可以比四會更加困難雙打。

sentences.english: How many times did Alex get through to the finals of the men's singles at Wimbledon?
sentences.chinese: 阿力克斯幾次進入溫布爾登男子網球單打決賽？

sentences.english: And all the gold and silver medals of women's single and double were won by the Chinese players.
sentences.chinese: 女子單打和雙打的所有金牌和銀牌也爲中國隊奪得。

sentences.english: Feed it to Gasol early and often, and have him turn and face Chuck Hayes.
sentences.chinese: 在比賽中早早得喂球給枷鎖，讓他單打海耶斯。

sentences.english: John collected a double and two singles.
sentences.chinese: 約翰一舉贏了一場雙打和兩場單打。

sentences.english: We play many singles matches with students of Jiangmen tennis academy in morning and afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，下午與江門網球學校作多埸單打練習賽。

definition: to snatch gold/to take first place in a competition
bronze medal/bronze plaque bearing a business name or logo etc/CL:枚[mei2]
to compete/to take part (in a sports event)
(sports) member of the national team/national representative/(medicine, chess etc) one of the most highly skilled practitioners in one's country
to monopolize/to take on responsibility over everything/to undertake the whole task
